DOC.brief_summary: 35 participant diagnose major depressive disorder randomize 3 intervention group : ( 1 ) aerobic exercise ( AE ) ; ( 2 ) placebo ( stretch ) exercise ( ST ) ; ( 3 ) intervention ( control group ; NI ) . The intervention length 10 consecutive day . In group 1 ( aerobic exercise ) 2 ( sham exercise ) , participant exercise 30 minute day . Depressive symptom assess day begin intervention day end intervention participant group .
DOC.detailed_description: In aerobic exercise ( AE ) group , intervention consist 30 minute daily brisk walk jogging . This do individually supervise . Participants miss > 2 training session consider non-completers . Exercise intensity maintain within 65 % -75 % age-predicted maximal heart rate , commonly prescribed study use aerobic exercise alleviate depression . Heart rate monitoring device use . Participants stretch ( ST ) group also perform daily 30 minute exercise program `` sham '' exercise , consist stretch exercise . Several muscle group ( thigh , calf , gluteal , shoulder , back ) stretch 60 second , equivalent rest interval stretch series . These activity also individual supervise . As case AE intervention , participant miss > 2 training session consider non-completers . Participants control ( NI ) group receive intervention prescribe medication . All participant start antidepressant within less 2 week study entry .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) antidepressant drug therapy initiate less 2 week score 29 Beck depression inventory medical contraindication exercise practice inability understand write French betablocking drug another form antidepressant therapy ( sleep deprivation , electroconvulsive therapy )
